reviewText: Ordered this book for a friend who is interested in DNA and viruses. She said she enjoyed it and appreciated the gift.

This episode of The New Explorers title is "On The Trail of A Killer Virus. This is the story of a 19 year old young man and his fiance who die of a mysterious disease in Gallup, New Mexico. Several members of the Navajo tribe come down with the disease and die also. The Center of Disease Control in Atlanta sends several investigators to Gallup to get a handle on this virus.
